results.title: Simvastatin preserves the structure of coronary adventitial vasa vasorum in experimental hypercholesterolemia independent of lipid lowering.
results.text_hl: We aimed to determine the effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on coronary @<m>DISEASE_Congenital_bilateral_aplasia_of_vas_deferens</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C535984 @@@VV@@@ neovascularization, in the absence of @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ lowering.
